ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup rosé wine, or as needed
½ cup white sugar, or to taste

cookingTips: Use frozen fruit directly from the freezer for the best sorbet consistency
Add wine and sugar gradually while processing to achieve desired sweetness and texture
Serve immediately for a slushier consistency, or refreeze in an ice cream maker for firmer texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the difference between blended and churned sorbet and how to adjust ingredients for taste preferences.
